# valueWraps

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the receiver wraps around the minimum and maximum values.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var valueWraps: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if, when incrementing or decrementing, the value wraps around to the minimum or maximum. [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if the value stays pinned at the minimum or maximum. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Specifying how stepper cell responds

- **autorepeat**: A Boolean value indicating how the receiver responds to mouse events.
